body:
Select	FD.SeriID, FD.FisDetayID, FD.AddDate, FT.FisTurAdi, P.ProsesAdi, FD.Miktar_Mt, S.UrunAdi, GCM.CikanID
From	IT06_HareketFisD FD
		INNER JOIN IT06_HareketFisM FM On FM.FisID = FD.FisID
		INNER JOIN IT01_FisTurleri FT ON FT.FisTurID = Fm.FisTurID
		INNER JOIN IT06_StokKarti SK On SK.UrunID = Fd.urunID 
		INNER JOIN IT06_Stoklar S On S.UrunTID = SK.UrunTID
		INNER JOIN IT08_SeriM SM ON Sm.seriID = FD.SeriID
		LEFT OUTER JOIN IT07_GerCikanMalzeme GCM ON GCM.FisDetayID = FD.FisDetayID
		OUTER APPLY(
		Select	Distinct GCM2.PRosesID
		From	IT07_GerGirenMalzemeD G 
				LEFT OUTER JOIN IT07_GerCikanMalzeme GCM2 ON GCM2.CikanID = G.CikanID
		Where G.FisDetayID = FD.FisDetayID) GMD
		LEFT OUTER JOIN IT01_Prosesler P ON P.ProsesID = ISNULL(GCM.ProsesID,GMD.ProsesID)
		LEFT OUTER JOIN IT01_KaliteKodlari KK ON KK.KaliteID = SM.KaliteID 
Where	FD.SeriID = $CURSOR$
Order By FD.FisDetayID
